Unordered list

This is the default styling for an ul tag. However if you are fighting with a CSS reset, or stylesheet that removes these you can add the class list-bullet as add them back.

Inline block list

Inline block lists only have padding in between elements. The first and last child <li> elements have their padding removed.

Horizontal list

The horizontal lists use floats on the <li> as a result it can be mixed in with the .list-horizontal-condensed class to remove all white space between the <li>
